name: Cartigen 500 mg / 400 mg tablet
description: The glucosamine helps to keep up the health of the cartilage. Glucosamine is also used to treat rheumatoid arthritis and other conditions, such as inflammatory bowel disease, asthma, allergies, chronic venous insufficiency, sports injuries, temporomandibular joint problems (TMJ), and long-term low back pain.
label: medicine
